metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to the ventilation of buildings and dwelling units
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to the ventilation of buildings and dwelling units

requirements.description: Every dwelling unit shall be provided with ventilation conforming to this Section or CSA F326
requirements.exact_quote: Every dwelling unit shall be provided with ventilation conforming to this Section or CSA F326

requirements.description: Minimum ventilation capacity for principal ventilation system based on floor area
requirements.exact_quote: The principal ventilation system shall have a capacity of not less than 0.3 L/s per m2 of floor area served

requirements.description: Minimum total capacity for principal ventilation system
requirements.exact_quote: The principal ventilation system shall have a total capacity of not less than 50 L/s

requirements.description: Minimum ventilation rate per bedroom
requirements.exact_quote: Each bedroom shall have a ventilation rate of not less than 5 L/s

requirements.description: Minimum ventilation rate for living area
requirements.exact_quote: The combined living area shall have a ventilation rate of not less than 10 L/s

requirements.description: Dwelling units shall be provided with a mechanical ventilation system
requirements.exact_quote: Dwelling units shall be provided with a mechanical ventilation system

requirements.description: Heat recovery ventilators (HRVs) or energy recovery ventilators (ERVs) shall be installed where required by the applicable energy code
requirements.exact_quote: Heat recovery ventilators (HRVs) or energy recovery ventilators (ERVs) shall be installed where required by the applicable energy code

requirements.description: Ventilation ductwork shall be constructed of galvanized steel, aluminum, or other approved materials
requirements.exact_quote: Ventilation ductwork shall be constructed of galvanized steel, aluminum, or other approved materials

requirements.description: Ventilation ductwork in unconditioned spaces shall be insulated to prevent condensation
requirements.exact_quote: Ventilation ductwork in unconditioned spaces shall be insulated to prevent condensation

requirements.description: Minimum height of outdoor air intake above grade or roof surface
requirements.exact_quote: Outdoor air intakes shall be located not less than 450 mm above grade or roof surface

requirements.description: Minimum separation between outdoor air intake and exhaust outlet
requirements.exact_quote: Outdoor air intakes shall be located not less than 1800 mm from exhaust outlets

requirements.description: Minimum separation between outdoor air intake and gas vent
requirements.exact_quote: Outdoor air intakes shall be located not less than 900 mm from gas appliance vents

requirements.description: Minimum exhaust capacity for kitchen exhaust fan
requirements.exact_quote: Kitchen exhaust fans shall have a capacity of not less than 50 L/s

requirements.description: A range hood or equivalent exhaust device shall be provided over cooking appliances
requirements.exact_quote: A range hood or equivalent exhaust device shall be provided over cooking appliances

requirements.description: Minimum exhaust capacity for bathroom exhaust fan
requirements.exact_quote: Bathroom exhaust fans shall have a capacity of not less than 25 L/s

requirements.description: Every bathroom without an operable window shall be provided with mechanical exhaust ventilation
requirements.exact_quote: Every bathroom without an operable window shall be provided with mechanical exhaust ventilation

requirements.description: Exhaust ducts from kitchens and bathrooms shall terminate outdoors
requirements.exact_quote: Exhaust ducts from kitchens and bathrooms shall terminate outdoors

requirements.description: Exhaust ducts shall not terminate in attics, crawl spaces, or other interior spaces
requirements.exact_quote: Exhaust ducts shall not terminate in attics, crawl spaces, or other interior spaces

requirements.description: Exhaust duct terminations shall be fitted with a cap or louver to prevent entry of rain, snow and vermin
requirements.exact_quote: Exhaust duct terminations shall be fitted with a cap or louver to prevent entry of rain, snow and vermin

requirements.description: Make-up air shall be provided to replace air exhausted from a dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: Make-up air shall be provided to replace air exhausted from a dwelling unit

requirements.description: Exhaust capacity threshold above which dedicated make-up air is required
requirements.exact_quote: Where exhaust capacity exceeds 75 L/s, a dedicated make-up air system shall be provided

requirements.description: Adequate combustion air shall be provided to fuel-burning appliances
requirements.exact_quote: Adequate combustion air shall be provided to fuel-burning appliances

requirements.description: Combustion air ducts shall be sized in accordance with the appliance installation requirements
requirements.exact_quote: Combustion air ducts shall be sized in accordance with the appliance installation requirements
